data.name: initMarble
data.description: Create a new marble on a distributed ledger.

data.name: readMarble
data.description: Fetch a marble record of a specified name from the ledger.

data.name: transferMarble
data.description: Transfer the marble of a specified name to a new owner.

data.name: getMarblesByRange
data.description: Fetch marble records with names between a start-name and end-name alphabetically.

data.name: transferMarblesBasedOnColor
data.description: Transfer all marbles of a specified color to a new owner.

data.name: getHistoryForMarble
data.description: Fetch the history of the marble of a specified name.

input.value: string.concat("Failed to get history for key ", $flow.parameters.name, ": ", $activity[GetHistory].message)

data.name: delete
data.description: Delete the marble of a specified name and/or its index keys.

triggers.name: Transaction
triggers.description: Create a new marble on a distributed ledger.

handlers.description: Create a new marble on a distributed ledger.
Fetch a marble record of a specified name from the ledger.
Transfer the marble of a specified name to a new owner.
Fetch marble records with names between a start-name and end-name alphabetically.
Transfer all marbles of a specified color to a new owner.
Fetch the history of the marble of a specified name.
Delete the marble of a specified name and/or its index keys.
